title: Griffiths polynomials of $q$-Racah type
authors: Nicolas Crampe and Luc Frappat and Julien Gaboriaud and Eric Ragoucy
abstract:
New bivariate Griffiths polynomials of $q$-Racah type are introduced and
characterized. They generalize the polynomials orthogonal on the multinomial
distribution introduced by R. Griffiths fifty years ago. They also correspond
to a $q$-deformation of the Griffiths polynomials of Racah type introduced
previously by the authors and collaborators. The latter are recovered from the
former by a $q\to1$ limit. We show that these new polynomials are bispectral
and biorthogonal. We also exhibit some symmetry relations that are essential in
the proof of the bispectrality property.
